snippet: To understand how murder lives on in a city that has seen crime fall to historic lows, The New York Times is taking a deep look at the 40th Precinct in the South Bronx. Articles in this series will examine the life and death of each person murdered this year in the precinct, among the few places in the city where crime remains stubbornly high.
lead_paragraph: To understand how murder lives on in a city that has seen crime fall to historic lows, The New York Times is taking a deep look at the 40th Precinct in the South Bronx. Articles in this series will examine the life and death of each person murdered this year in the precinct, among the few places in the city where crime remains stubbornly high.
